ISSUE.TITLE: Plugin disappear after installed
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.3 Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. Go to <storeurl>/Admin/Plugin/List 2. Install any plugin. 3. After installation completed, click on "Restart application to apply changes" button. 4. Check the plugin list after restart, last installed plugin is disappeared. 5. Try clean and build project, execute the project and refresh the step 1. Now can find the plugin in list.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #4529 further changes in pickup in store fee calculation
